prompt: "Oh hey there buddy. Enjoying your sweet ride?"

options.display: [2] "I know you took the SYSTOLIC MOTIVATOR."
[1] "I know just how valuable it is. You thought you could make quite the deal by selling the car at a markup without it."

dialogue.prompt: "Oh I get it, you’re bluffing me, huh? Won’t work buddy. You’re dealing with a shark. Go back to swim with your little school. After all, I scammed you."

options.display: [2] "Sure, that’s what you think. But I’m the better scammer, and I know it."
[1] "It’s no bluff. You’re not as hot as you think you are. A little birdie told me that you failed to scam the most gullible girl that walked by here. Some scammer you are."
[2] "Because I’m the better scammer. I’ve studied."

dialogue.prompt: "Studied? What do you mean? I got YEARS of experience on you kid!"

options.display: [1] "Yeah, but I know the science. The science of deal-making."
[1] "Yeah, all right in this nifty little book. All you’d need to know about hustles, buddy. From the finest in the art form."

dialogue.prompt: Oh, I see now, you’re trying to pull a fast one? It’ll never work.

options.display: [1] "As if I’d do something so obvious. This is the real deal. Now, you want the book or would you rather get stuck to losing deals to little girls?"

dialogue.prompt: "Arggh, fine! Here, take your WAD OF CASH back for it."

options.display: [1] "No, you know what I want, the SYSTOLIC MOTIVATOR please."

dialogue.prompt:
"Damn!  Fine! Here you go! Just give me that book! No one beats me!"
